makers.displaydate: 1939–1989; born Greensboro, AL; died New York, NY; active New York
makers.displaymaker: Scott Burton, 1939–1989; born Greensboro, AL; died New York, NY; active New York

texts.textentryhtml: Scott Burton championed functional art, creating works that he described as "sculpture in love with furniture." Calling to mind the simplified geometric forms of Minimalism, Burton’s table, an inverted cone balancing on a wide circular base, offers students and passersby a place to socialize or study.
